sent.orig: The word "dentist" denotes a doctor whose work is the care of teeth.
If it continues, the group advises parents to talk their child's dentist or doctor.
sent.trans: 如果吮吸拇指现象继续的话，该组织建议父母告诉儿童牙医或医生。

sent.orig: No longer able to put up with his toothache, he went to consult a dentist.
sent.trans: 他再也忍受不住牙痛，就去请牙医诊治。

sent.orig: But young Putin is also an ordinary boy, frightened by a looming visit to the dentist.
sent.trans: 但年轻的普京也是一个普通的男孩，也害怕去看牙医。

sent.orig: A large bill from the dentist made a hole in my savings.
sent.trans: 牙科医生送来了一张巨额帐单花掉了我大部分积蓄。
